info.task: open collapsed select-only combobox to first option
info.title: Open a collapsed select-only combobox to the first option in interaction mode

user: With focus on the combobox, open the combobox and set focus to the first option.
instructions.raw: With focus on the combobox, open the combobox and set focus to the first option.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: State of the combobox (expanded) is conveyed
Role of the popup ('listbox') is conveyed
Name of the popup ('Favorite Fruit') is conveyed
Text of the focused option in the popup ('Choose a Fruit') is conveyed
State of the focused option in the popup (selected) is conveyed
Position of the focused option in the popup (1) is conveyed
Number of options in the popup (13) is conveyed
